## DefaultPlayerEntityController.isOnPlatform property

Whether the entity is on a platform.

**Signature:**

```typescript
get isOnPlatform(): boolean;
```

## Remarks

A platform is any entity with a kinematic rigid body.

\*\*Category:\*\* Controllers
